lumis.portal.presentation.mode

Class PortalModes

  • java.lang.Object
    • lumis.portal.presentation.mode.PortalModes

  • @StableMinor(version="8.1",
             sinceVersion="7.1")
public abstract class PortalModes
extends Object
    Contains constants for the Portal Modes and a factory method for obtaining Portal Modes.

    • MODE_NAVIGATION
    • #MODE_IN_CONTEXT_EDIT
    • #MODE_PERSONALIZATION
    • #MODE_PUBLICATION_DASHBOARD
    • MODE_PORTAL_SETTINGS
